content: Then, go left and deal with the Stalwart and open the treasure chest it guards to collect Fine Gold Thread and Blood of the Iron Bull.

The content is as follows:
Then, go left and deal with the Stalwart and open the treasure chest it guards to collect Fine Gold Thread and Blood of the Iron Bull.
